channel.title: Travel on Snaperture - things i capture
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Snaperture - things i capture

item.title: experiences and success
item.description:
So, a new experience is coming up soon. I was awarded a travel grant (that’s a new one by itself). I am going to Stavanger, Norway, as part of my research studies. This would be my first real trip alone - no one but myself.

There is a certain freedom in this feeling, although there is definitely a sense of ‘oh dear’.

Hopefully it’s a success…

Speaking of success, I tend to ask myself: what will success look like? Will it be some tangible result of my research? Or will it just be some photographs I am happy with. As with everything, the answer is probably in the middle.
